head.title: March 23-29: INTERNATIONAL; SPY SATELLITES OVER NORTH KOREA

hedline.hl1: March 23-29: INTERNATIONAL; SPY SATELLITES OVER NORTH KOREA

block.p: Japan launched a rocket carrying two military spy satellites into low-level orbits, ignoring North Korea's threats of ''disastrous consequences.'' The satellites, which carry radar equipment and cameras, will allow Japan to monitor North Korea. North Korea, which test-fired two short-range missiles in the last month, had warned that the launching of the satellites could prompt it to drop a five-year-old, self-imposed moratorium on long-range missile firings.

Japan launched a rocket carrying two military spy satellites into low-level orbits, ignoring North Korea's threats of ''disastrous consequences.'' The satellites, which carry radar equipment and cameras, will allow Japan to monitor North Korea. North Korea, which test-fired two short-range missiles in the last month, had warned that the launching of the satellites could prompt it to drop a five-year-old, self-imposed moratorium on long-range missile firings.
